oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Untersuchungen zur Reduzierung von Rhizoctonia solani im ökologischen Kartoffelanbau
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schleuß, Dr. Uwe
Böhm, Dr. Herwart
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In organic potato production Rhizoctonia solani leads to yield losses and quality deficiency with grave consequences for the saleability. To minimize these disease effects it is necessary to set up a cluster of different cultivation steps. Up to now the application of plant strengthening products shows inconsistent results. In our field trials we found slight yield increases, but especially an improvement of product quality.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Schleuß, Dr. Uwe and Böhm, Dr. Herwart (2005) Untersuchungen zur Reduzierung von Rhizoctonia solani im ökologischen Kartoffelanbau. [Investigations to reducing Rhizoctonia solani in organic potato production.] In: Heß, J and Rahmann, G (Eds.) Ende der Nische, Beiträge zur 8. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, kassel university press GmbH, Kassel.
